attributes.action: Extention of Furlough scheme for Hotel Employees.
attributes.additional_details: EXTENTION OF FURLOUGH SCHEME FOR HOTEL EMPLOYEES
attributes.background: Hotel employees are getting redundant or employers are putting them on lay off as there is no sign of business coming up. Government need to extend the furlough scheme without employer contribution as some employers are not able to give 10% or 20% salary with pension and National Insurance.

rejection.details:
